description:
Dashboard for the OPNsense Prometheus Exporter

https://github.com/AthennaMind/opnsense-exporter

panels.description: Total number of scrapes by the OPNsense exporter
panels.title: OPNSense Exporter Scrapes Total

panels.description: The current status of OPNsense (1 = up, 0 = down)
panels.title: OPNSense Status

panels.description: The total errors by endpoint returned by the OPNsense API during data fetching
panels.title: OPNSense Scrape Endpoint Errors

panels.description:
Status points of services uptime

1 - Available 
0 - Unavailable
panels.title: Services Status History

panels.description: RTT is the average (mean) of the round trip time in milliseconds by name
panels.title: Gateway RTT

panels.description: RTTd is the standard deviation of the round trip time in milliseconds by name
panels.title: Gateway RTTd

panels.description: Gateway Loss Percentage by Gateway Name
panels.title: Gateway Loss Percentage

panels.description:
Status points of the gateway uptime. 

1 - Available 
0 - Unavailable
panels.title: Gateway Status History

panels.description: Total received data with applied range function by the Rate Interval selector
panels.title: [RATE $rate_interval]] Received Bytes By Interface

panels.description: Total transmitted data with applied range function by the Rate Interval selector
panels.title: [RATE $rate_interval] Transmitted Bytes By Interface

panels.description: MTU of the interface by interface name and device
panels.title: Interfaces [ Device - Name ] MTU

panels.description: Rate of Sent and Received ARP requests
panels.title: [RATE $rate_interval] ARP Requests

panels.description: Total of Sent and Received ARP requests
panels.title: [TOTAL] ARP Requests

title: OPNSense
